text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha nih chea meakra robsakhnhom del khnhom ampeavneav towkean a l laoh daoy mean karchehdoeng chbasa leasa khnhom ning anak del ban daertam khnhom( trauv ampeavneav anak phe sa ng tiet towkean a l laoh) . haey a l laoh mha chreah saat haey khnhom minmen chea anak del sthet knongchamnaom puok del thveu shi ri k laey
